PROJECTS
Project Title: ONLINE TASK MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
Technologies Used: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Project Overview: Developed a full-stack web application that allows users to create, manage, and track tasks efficiently. The application includes user authentication, task categorization, and deadline reminders.
Project Title: VIDEO CALL INTERCOM SYSTEM BASED ON ANALOG/IP WITH VIBRATION SENSOR
Technologies Used: Raspberry Pi, Python, OpenCV, IoT, SIP (Session Initiation Protocol), WebRTC, Analog/IP Camera, Vibration Sensor, Arduino, Node.js, Express.js
Project Overview: Developed a smart intercom system that enables video calls over an IP/analog network with an integrated vibration sensor for security alerts. The system allows real-time communication between users and detects physical vibrations (e.g., knocks or unauthorized tampering), triggering alerts and video.
